_header: For dread oft my lips I steek

BodDig102.First Lines:
For drede ofte my lippes y stekeffor false reportours that trouhte
                    mys famed…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…ȝe haue fre wille chese ȝoure chaunceTo haue
                    wiþ god werre or pes
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 9-14.

         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: 39-44.
